snippet.title: Lost in Darkness | Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Lost in Darkness is a 3D top-down survival horror action game set in the Atlas Mountains in Morocco. In 1993, on top of the snowy Atlas Mountains, you play as a motorcycle gendarmerie officer who finds himself trapped alone, investigating the mysterious disappearance of a royal gendarmerie patrol car and its links to the sinister Oppenheimer Institute.
A free Demo of the game is available on Itch.io, for all to try.
Thank you to all our supporters for their feedback and encouragement.

WISHLIST ON STEAM NOW:
- https://store.steampowered.com/app/2216580/Lost_in_Darkness/

FREE DEMO
- https://outcastgamestudio.itch.io/lost-in-darkness-patrol-mode-demo

CONTACT US:
- https://www.instagram.com/outcastgamestudio/
- https://twitter.com/OutcastDigital1
